name: Baldi's Baldi's in Education and Baldies
name_original: Baldi's Baldi's in Education and Baldies
description:
Welcome to Baldi's Baldi's in Education and Baldies! The only game that teaches fun and Baldies! Seriously though, this mod is very weird. Baldi's face has been plastered all over the schoolhouse, and it is your job to collect all 7 Baldi-books, and escape that school! You'll meet some weird new Baldies along the way too...

NOTE THAT THIS MOD IS MADE FOR 64BIT OPERATING SYSTEMS. You may have trouble loading this on a 32bit OS.
